firstMonth.title: First month: Preparation
steps: Writing all texts and spam word checking

items.question: How does the pricing work?
items.answer: Our pricing has two phases. The initial setup (first 2 months) includes complete preparation and campaign launch. After that, you can purchase additional services as needed.

items.question: What's included in the initial setup?
items.answer: The initial setup includes campaign configuration, strategy development, email writing, lead verification, and campaign launch. All the preparatory work necessary for successful email outreach.

items.question: What happens after the initial phase is completed?
items.answer: After completing the initial phase, you'll have a fully functional cold outreach system. For continued operation, you'll need lead database updates and text optimization based on data collected from the previous month.

items.question: Can I change or customize my package?
items.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or remove additional services. Contact us for custom solutions that aren't listed in our standard packages.
